title: Bug Detection
text: Empower your team to focus on innovation, not bug-fixing, with our advanced Bug Detection Agent.

section.title: Is your team being consumed by bug-fixing?
section.content: Free up your engineering team's time by using our AI to effortlessly spot and propose solutions for potential bugs across your codebase.

section.title: Focus on what matters
section.content: Industry studies show a significant amount of engineering time is consumed by bug fixing, especially those pesky "unknown unknowns". Our AI tool proactively uncovers these issues, providing smart solutions and freeing up your team to accelerate feature development.
